summary: Building a personal platform for Florida Dave — a 40-year-old entrepreneur — featuring video content with likes/views tracking, and a personal About section highlighting content creation, domain investing, and a journey toward location freedom and beach living.
known_issues: Videos, likes, and view counts not displaying correctly — multiple build attempts have failed

existing_features.title: Add an 'About Florida Dave' section to the frontend that displays a short bio paragraph describing Florida Dave as a 40-year-old entrepreneur building ideas publicly — spanning content creation and domain investing — and documenting the journey toward location freedom and beach living.
Add a subtle decorative wave-shaped SVG divider line above or below the About Florida Dave section to visually separate it from adjacent content.

new_feature_requests.summary: About section for Florida Dave with short bio paragraph and wave-design divider line
Display all user videos with likes and view counts
